derivation.yuyuan_name: Latin, from Greek hupereikon, from huper 'over, above' + ereikē 'heath'

means.word_mean: 1. large almost cosmopolitan genus of evergreen or deciduous shrubs and herbs with often showy yellow flowers; cosmopolitan except tropical lowlands and arctic or high altitudes and desert regions
